name: Pumpkins ate my farmers (Demo)
description:
Controls

Move with arrows or aswd.

Fire with spacebar.

Pumpkins Ate My Farmers

Mike the pig is afraid of the dark, tonight it's Halloween and this night really scary, blind by his fear all his friends looks like creepy monsters.
